tool.name: FeatureLinkerUnlabeledQT
tool.description: Groups corresponding features from multiple maps.
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && mkdir ${' '.join(["'in/%s'" % (i) for i, f in enumerate($in) if f])} && ${' '.join(["ln -s '%s' 'in/%s/%s.%s' && " % (f, i, re.sub('[^\w\-_]', '_', f.element_identifier), $gxy2omsext(f.ext)) for i, f in enumerate($in) if f])} mkdir out && #if $design: mkdir design && ln -s '$design' 'design/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $design.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($design.ext)' && #end if
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in ${' '.join(["'in/%s/%s.%s'"%(i, re.sub('[^\w\-_]', '_', f.element_identifier), $gxy2omsext(f.ext)) for i, f in enumerate($in) if f])} -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("consensusxml")}' #if $design: -design 'design/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $design.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($design.ext)' #end if
## Postprocessing && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("consensusxml")}' '$out' #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.name: in
param.label: input files separated by blanks

param.name: design
param.label: input file containing the experimental design

param.name: keep_subelements
param.label: For consensusXML input only: If set, the sub-features of the inputs are transferred to the output

param.name: use_identifications
param.label: Never link features that are annotated with different peptides (only the best hit per peptide identification is taken into account)

param.name: nr_partitions
param.label: How many partitions in m/z space should be used for the algorithm (more partitions means faster runtime and more memory efficient execution )

param.name: ignore_charge
param.label: false [default]: pairing requires equal charge state (or at least one unknown charge '0'); true: Pairing irrespective of charge state

param.name: ignore_adduct
param.label: true [default]: pairing requires equal adducts (or at least one without adduct annotation); true: Pairing irrespective of adducts

section.name: distance_RT
section.title: Distance component based on RT differences

param.name: max_difference
param.label: Never pair features with a larger RT distance (in seconds)

param.name: exponent
param.label: Normalized RT differences ([0-1], relative to 'max_difference') are raised to this power (using 1 or 2 will be fast, everything else is REALLY slow)

param.name: weight
param.label: Final RT distances are weighted by this facto

section.name: distance_MZ
section.title: Distance component based on m/z differences

param.name: max_difference
param.label: Never pair features with larger m/z distance (unit defined by 'unit')

param.name: unit
param.label: Unit of the 'max_difference' paramete

param.name: exponent
param.label: Normalized ([0-1], relative to 'max_difference') m/z differences are raised to this power (using 1 or 2 will be fast, everything else is REALLY slow)

param.name: weight
param.label: Final m/z distances are weighted by this facto

section.name: distance_intensity
section.title: Distance component based on differences in relative intensity (usually relative to highest peak in the whole data set)

param.name: exponent
param.label: Differences in relative intensity ([0-1]) are raised to this power (using 1 or 2 will be fast, everything else is REALLY slow)

param.name: weight
param.label: Final intensity distances are weighted by this facto

param.name: log_transform
param.label: Log-transform intensities
param.help: If disabled, d = |int_f2 - int_f1| / int_max. If enabled, d = |log(int_f2 + 1) - log(int_f1 + 1)| / log(int_max + 1))

param.name: force
param.label: Overrides tool-specific checks

param.name: test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

param.name: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS
param.label: Optional outputs

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Groups corresponding features from multiple maps.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/doxygen/release/2.6.0/html/TOPP_FeatureLinkerUnlabeledQT.html
